data.name: Everlife: Chapter 2
data.detailed_description:
Path Of Demise


Chapter 2 continues the story of the realm, primarily about what led you to your fate in the realm

Love and Games


Survive the murderous tsundere girls in Atrociki High School and the mysterious Glitchese in a twisted arcade. Letting your guard down could mean a second death, so you better be careful...

Detect and Recharge


Use the detector and recharger abilities to see enemies through obstacles and to recharge your abilities quickly. Swap between your abilities and use them wisely to remain standing!
data.about_the_game:
Path Of Demise


Chapter 2 continues the story of the realm, primarily about what led you to your fate in the realm

Love and Games


Survive the murderous tsundere girls in Atrociki High School and the mysterious Glitchese in a twisted arcade. Letting your guard down could mean a second death, so you better be careful...

Detect and Recharge


Use the detector and recharger abilities to see enemies through obstacles and to recharge your abilities quickly. Swap between your abilities and use them wisely to remain standing!
data.short_description: You put the mansion behind you, but your journey is far from over. Two more dimensions now stand before you, a glaring reminder of what led you to meet your fate. Do you have what it takes to survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700 CPU/Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2070 Super/AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 120 FPS Epic settings at 1080p, this is the computer I use. AMD and Ryzen are estimates, and may not be accurate
